remarks: The order isomorphism of the well-order ` R ` on ` A ` is an isomorphism onto ` ran O ` (which is a subset of ` A ` by ~ oif ).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2015.)
statement:
oicl.1 $e |- F = OrdIso ( R , A ) $.
oiiso2 $p |- ( ( R We A /\ R Se A ) -> F Isom _E , R ( dom F , ran F ) ) $.
